Title: Medical Reports Summarization Using Text-To-Text Transformer
Abstract: summarization of medical reports in order to make them accessible to the large public is an important task that can highly benefit from the recent emergence of the deep learning and large language models  llm . in this work we propose a fine tuned text to text transformer  t5  to summarize such reports. we train and test our model on the publicly available indiana dataset. we evaluate it using the rouge set of metrics. the obtained results are promising.
